article.title: On the invariant quantities in an entropy balance and their impact on the stability of some physical systems

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 1 shows X-ray pinhole images of structures observed in Dense Plasma Focus (DPF) pinches. What are these structures?
choices: Magnetic reconnection events and plasmoid instability

multiple_choice_question.text: What does Formula (12), Î  = min, represent in the context of the article?
choices: A necessary condition for the stability of steady relaxed states against small perturbations
The equilibrium condition for an open system

multiple_choice_question.text: Formula (17) is a London-like equation derived for the DPF pinch. What physical phenomenon does it describe?
choices: Confinement of plasma by magnetic fields

multiple_choice_question.text: Formula (25) presents a scaling law for the average magnetic field (< |B| >) in a rotating spherical shell of fluid. What is the key dimensionless quantity this scaling depends on?
